timeline.message: Intervals refactoring: ListView instead of LinearLayout with a list of views.
Intervals refactoring: avoid duplication code: IntervalsRecordingFragment is a version of IntervalsFragment.

Intervals refactoring: added stack mode to the intervals adapter with two possibilities: stack from top and stack from bottom.
Stack from top for recorded intervals (the first lap in the top).
Stack from bottom for recording intervals (the last lap in the top).
